ComicInfo.Summary:
"And All Is…" Proteus appears to reclaim his property and this time even eight ‘Busters may not be enough to keep the elder god from getting his way! Join us for the bombastic conclusion to GET REAL!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dan Schoening (a) & Luis Antonio Delgado (c) | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Erik Burnham (a) & Luis Antonio Delgado (c) | 2 |
